title: National Arbitration Centre calls on Finance Minister
body_lines: Officials of the Sri Lanka National Arbitration Centre (SLNAC) paid a courtesy call on the new Finance Minister and former Justice Minister Ali Sabry PC. Here (from left): SLNAC CEO/Chief Legal Officer Nandun Fernando AAL, COO Johann Atapattu, Finance Minister Ali Sabry, SLNAC Chairman Sujeeve Samaraweera and Board Member Prof. Chitra Wedikkara
